text: If the #MadPooper turns herself in, we'll give her a year's supply of TP to help with her "runs" 💩 #EnjoyTheGohttps://t.co/GgEAyYp6aM
title: The Mad Pooper Is Sorry For Repeatedly Pooping on Colorado Family's Lawn
